sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"丢失，遗失"之意。
means: lose ： 最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
miss ： 着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。
misplace ： 指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均表示对女性的尊称。
means: madam ： 夫人、太太，女士，小姐。与尊称男人的用词sir相对，多用于对已婚或未婚妇女的礼貌称呼，如店员对女顾客的称呼，后面不加姓名。如果已知对方的身份或姓名可在此词后面加上姓名职位。
Mrs ： 太太，夫人，是mistress的缩略形式，对已婚妇女的称呼。
lady ： 女士，夫人，与gentleman相对，是对女性的礼貌称呼，多用于演讲或祝酒时称呼在场的女性。
miss ： 小姐，是对未婚或不知婚姻状况的女性的称呼，与姓氏连用时应大写。

list.explanation: [表示惊奇、慌张等的感叹语]哎呀!天哪!

miss[v.错过;想念]+ing表形容词→adj.不见的, 缺少的
re不+miss送,放出,派,错过→不送出去→怠慢的
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ive……的→始终放出→纵容的
sub在下面+miss放+ive表形容词→放下面→恭顺的
mission[n.使命,任务;使团,代表团]+ary人→n.传教士

e出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→送出去
miss派+ion表名词→派遣
re再+miss送,放出+ion表名词→再次放过[别人]→宽恕
o出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→放出去→省略
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→始终放出→允许
trans横+miss送,放出+ion表名词→横着送出去→播送
e出+miss送,放出+ary人→送出去的人
sub下面+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→放下面→屈服
dis分开+miss送→分开送出→解散
miss放出,错过→错过;想念

Sentence.sentence: Beauticians, bartenders, piano players and people with purple hats, Welty's people come from afternoons spent visiting with old friends, from walks through the streets of her native Jackson, miss.

Sentence.sentence: But Moore was sick of missing out on candies.

Sentence.sentence: But what if you miss something?

Sentence.sentence: From that day on, Cathy kept swimming and didn't miss a single practice.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He said the chickens had never missed a meal and he could not figure out why some of them had stopped laying eggs.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Her marriage with a serious music critic has drawn her to his world, so she is now crazy about classical music and will not miss any chance to attend a concert with her husband.

Sentence.sentence: I missed my train, so I'm going to be late.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: If Tononi's theory is right, it would explain why, when we miss a night's, we find it harder the next day to concentrate and learn new information — our brains may have smaller room for new experiences.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解  七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you miss this chance, it may be years before you get another one.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'm sure your missing glasses will turn up sooner or later.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: In my husband's hand was my wallet, with not a penny missing.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Matilda's battles with her cruel parents and the bossy headmistress, Miss Trunchbull, are equally fumy and frightening, but they're also aspirational.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Miss Chen, I was wondering if you could find out how I did on the middle-term exam?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Miss Longfield added: "Then there is this push to connect—if you go offline, will you miss something, will you miss out, will you show that you don't care about those people you are following, all of those come together in a huge way at once."
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: More broadly the Wakefield survey suggests that employers may be missing a low-cost way to give workers something of value.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Over a third of mums felt they needed more training and around half said they missed going out with friends.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: She didn't want her children to miss out on their roots.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: They recognize there's something missing in their lives, but it's hard to step off the track.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: To avoid missing the last train, please check the last train times posted in the station.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: What a pity! You missed the sightseeing, or we would have had a good time together.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When fat and salt are removed from food, the food tastes as if is missing something.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Devoted concertgoers who reply that recordings are no substitute for live performance are missing the point.
But thinking what nobody else has thought and telling others what they have missed may not change their views.
It measures things that do not matter and misses things that do.
That misses the way the surveillance economy works.
Also missing is any discussion of eliminating Saturday letter delivery.

sentences.en: Her children have gone to Australia, and she missed them very much.

sentences.en: She's missed school two days this week.
sentences.cn: 本周她缺课两天。

sentences.en: I don't want to miss seeing that film on television tonight.
sentences.cn: 我不想错过今晚在电视上看那部影片的机会。

sentences.en: The two planes missed disaster by a matter of inches when they nearly collided.

sentences.en: You've missed two words.

collins.item: USED AS A TITLE OR A FORM OF ADDRESS

entry.def: You use Miss in front of the name of a girl or unmarried woman when you are speaking to her or referring to her.
entry.tran: 小姐(用于女孩或未婚女子的姓名前面)

example.ex: It was nice talking to you, Miss Giroux...
example.tran: 吉鲁小姐，和您谈话很愉快。

example.ex: Miss Singleton didn't call back, did she?...
example.tran: 辛格尔顿小姐没有回电话，是吗？

entry.def: In some schools, children address their women teachers as Miss .
entry.tran: 小姐(一些学校里孩子对女教师的称呼)

example.ex: 'Chivers!' — 'Yes, Miss?'
example.tran: “奇弗斯！”——“什么事，老师？”

entry.def: People sometimes address young women as Miss .
entry.tran: 女士，小姐(有时用于称呼年轻女子)

example.ex: 'I wouldn't know about that, Miss,' the woman said, backing away.
example.tran: “我不想知道那件事情，小姐，”这个女人一边后退一边说。

entry.def: Miss is used in front of the name of a place or region to refer to the young woman who has been chosen in a competition as the most beautiful woman there.
entry.tran: 小姐，皇后(用于地名或地区前，表示某地选美比赛中的冠军)

example.ex: Kappy was named Miss Hawaii in 1954.
example.tran: 卡皮被选为1954年的夏威夷小姐。

example.ex: ...two former Miss Scotlands.
example.tran: 两名前苏格兰小姐

entry.def: If you miss something, you fail to hit it, for example when you have thrown something at it or you have shot a bullet at it.

example.ex: She hurled the ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head...
example.tran: 她用力把烟灰缸从房间那头扔过来，差点砸到我的脑袋。

example.ex: When I'd missed a few times, he suggested I rest the rifle on a rock to steady it.
example.tran: 好几次我都没打中，于是他建议我把步枪放在岩石上面以稳定枪托。

entry.def: In sport, if you miss a shot, you fail to get the ball in the goal, net, or hole.

example.ex: He scored four of the goals but missed a penalty.
example.tran: 他4次射门得分，却罚失了1粒点球。

entry.def: If you miss something, you fail to notice it.
entry.tran: 未注意到;未觉察到;忽略掉

example.ex: From this vantage point he watched, his searching eye never missing a detail...
example.tran: 他从这个有利的地点观察，目光敏锐，不放过任何一个细节。

example.ex: It's the first thing you see as you come round the corner. You can't miss it...
example.tran: 你转过拐角后第一眼就会看到它，不会错过的。

entry.def: If you miss the meaning or importance of something, you fail to understand or appreciate it.
entry.tran: 不理解，没有领会(意义或重要性)

example.ex: Tambov had slightly missed the point...
example.tran: 坦波夫有点不得要领。

example.ex: She seems to have missed the joke.
example.tran: 她好像没有听懂这个笑话。

entry.def: If you miss a chance or opportunity, you fail to take advantage of it.

example.ex: Williams knew that she had missed her chance of victory...
example.tran: 威廉姆斯知道她已经失掉了夺取胜利的机会。

example.ex: It was too good an opportunity to miss.
example.tran: 这个机会太好了，不容错过。

entry.def: If you miss someone who is no longer with you or who has died, you feel sad and wish that they were still with you.

example.ex: Your mama and I are gonna miss you at Christmas...
example.tran: 我和你妈妈过圣诞节的时候会想念你的。

example.ex: He was a gentle, sensitive, lovable man who will be missed by a host of friends.
example.tran: 他是一个温和、体贴而且可爱的人，许多朋友都会想念他的。

entry.def: If you miss something, you feel sad because you no longer have it or are no longer doing or experiencing it.

example.ex: I could happily move back into a flat if it wasn't for the fact that I'd miss my garden...
example.tran: 要不是惦念我的花园，我会高高兴兴地搬回公寓。

example.ex: He missed having good friends.
example.tran: 他怀念曾经拥有好朋友的时光。

entry.def: If you miss something such as a plane or train, you arrive too late to catch it.

example.ex: I had already missed my flight, and the next one wasn't until the following morning...
example.tran: 我已经错过了我的航班，下一班飞机得等到明天早晨。

example.ex: He missed the last bus home.
example.tran: 他没有赶上回家的末班公交车。

entry.def: If you miss something such as a meeting or an activity, you do not go to it or take part in it.

example.ex: It's a pity Makku and I had to miss our lesson last week...
example.tran: 很遗憾我和马库上周不得不缺课。

example.ex: You won't be missing much on TV tonight apart from the usual repeats...
example.tran: 除了通常的重播节目，今晚的电视节目你不会错过多少的。

entry.def: If you give something a miss, you decide not to do it or not to go to it.

example.ex: Do you mind if I give it a miss?
example.tran: 如果我决定不去，你会介意吗？

means.word_mean: 2. a failure to hit (or meet or find etc)
1. fail to perceive or to catch with the senses or the mind;

sentences.sentence: "We lost part of what he said"

means.word_mean: 2. feel or suffer from the lack of;
3. fail to attend an event or activity;

sentences.sentence: "The workers on the conveyor belt miss one out of ten"

means.word_mean: 5. fail to reach or get to;

sentences.sentence: "There is something missing in my jewellery box!"
"The child had been missing for a week"

sentences.cn: 我用不着担心,我们什么也不会错过的.

sentences.cn: 有了它,您就不会再错过任何课程, 也不会遇到乘车穿过大半个城市去上课这样的麻烦.
sentences.en: There are no missed classes, and no bus rides across town to get to class.

sentences.cn: 真遗憾,你错过了那班公共汽车.
sentences.en: It is a pity that you should miss the bus.

sentences.cn: 她错过了访问夏威夷的机会.
sentences.en: She missed out on a chance to visit Hawaii.

sentences.cn: 因为我们错过了船, 我们只好空寄包裹.
sentences.en: As we missed the ship, we had to send the parcel by airmail.

sentences.cn: 他是那么好的一个人,而她却差点儿错过他!
sentences.en: He was such a good person but she almost missed him!

sentences.cn: 她走了以后，人们会非常思念她的。
sentences.en: She will be greatly missed when she leaves.

sentences.cn: 放纵思念痛苦的纷扰盘点寂寞淌过坎坷的声音.
sentences.en: Indulges the missing pain troubled, inventorying dripped lonely the rough sound.

sentences.cn: 寂寞夜里, 思念著你, 想逃也逃不了.
sentences.en: The lonely night, is missing you, wanted to away also cannot runaway.

sentences.cn: 于是,我在想: 明天秋风会带走雨的思念 吗 ?
sentences.en: So I was thinking: autumn winds will pick up tomorrow, do miss the rain?

sentences.cn: 思念可以让你流泪, 思念也可以让你含笑.
sentences.en: Missing may let you burst into tears, missing also may let you have a smile.

sentences.cn: 她非常思念自己的故乡.
sentences.en: She missed her hometown very much.

sentences.cn: 放飞自己的灵魂, 释放对你的思念.
sentences.en: Flying my own soul, release my missing to you.

sentences.cn: 悠悠的云里有淡淡的诗,淡淡的诗里有我绵绵的思念.
sentences.en: Light poems are in leisurely clouds and continuous missing is in light poems.

sentences.cn: 爸, 为什么我思念老朋友?
sentences.en: Dad, why do I miss my old friends?

sentences.cn: 噢,我的床夜晚是如此冰冷,对你的思念与日俱增.
sentences.en: Oh my bed is so cold at night and I miss you more each day.

sentences.cn: 当你不在,我就是如此思念.
sentences.en: The way I'll miss you when you're not there.

sentences.cn: 而且因为太思念你我喝的有点多了.
sentences.en: And because i was missing you so much i had drunk bit too much.

sentences.cn: 你快回来,把我的思念带回来, 别让我的心空如大海.
sentences.en: You back quickly back mine missing belt, do not let my heart spatial like sea.

sentences.cn: 今晚是否寂寞? 是否思念着我?
sentences.en: Are you lonesome tonight ? Do you miss me tonight?

sentences.cn: 而我, 是你的思念, 是你远归的恋人, 是你梦寐里温馨的故园.
sentences.en: I, is thy miss, is thy return lover, and is thy dream and warm homestead.

sentences.cn: 玫瑰需要阳光的照耀, 紫罗兰渴望露水的浇灌, 天堂的天使们都知晓我对你的思念.
sentences.en: Flowers need sunshine, violets need dew, all angels in heaven know I miss you.

sentences.cn: 那首俄罗斯歌曲表达了思念亲人的忧伤心情.
sentences.en: The Russian song conveyed the feeling of sadness for the missing loved one.

sentences.cn: 尽不知思念无味浪迹天涯独取一瓢思念黄河水.
sentences.en: Do not miss tasteless roaming alone took a ladle thoughts of water.

sentences.cn: 从他的眼中,我可以看出他仍然还思念往日的奢华生活.
sentences.en: From his eyes I can see he still misses the timethe flesh pots of Egypt.

sentences.cn: 身在异国他乡, 唯有家最让我思念.
sentences.en: Living outside my country, what I miss the most is my family.

sentences.cn: 丹, 我永远思念你, 你是我心中永远的唯一, 我爱你直到永远.
sentences.en: Dan, I always miss you, you are only my heart forever, and I love you forever.

sentences.cn: 七月,是我期盼飞扬的季节! 是我炙热燃烧的思念!
sentences.en: July is the season I look forward to flying! I miss the burning hot!

sentences.cn: 我多么思念你呀!
sentences.en: I miss you terribly!

sentences.cn: 咱想不管咱们是否狼吞虎咽这道菜,都一定会思念起她.
sentences.en: I'm sure we would be missing her while stuffing our faces.

sentences.cn: 蔓延的思念. 还有我的心都寄放在你那.
sentences.en: The spread of the missing. my heart that you are parked.

sentences.cn: 这一天, 我总是想起过去,万分思念我的老朋友.
sentences.en: This day, I'm always miss yean for the past and old friend.

sentences.cn: 伴随着不尽思念而来的必然是漫长的等待.
sentences.en: Is following is inevitably the long waiting which endless missing comes.

sentences.cn: 当你在非常思念某一个人的那一瞬间.
sentences.en: There are moments in life when you miss someone so much.

sentences.cn: 我开始思念在家乡的日子.
sentences.en: I began to yearn for ( miss ) the days in my hometown.

sentences.cn: 因为在我的思想里,深深的思念会阻止我重新开始.
sentences.en: Because in my thought the deeply missing will stop you from starting.

Sentence.sentence: Some passengers remain missing, the Costa Rican foreign ministry said, but did not specify how many.
A tour boat turned o v e r o f f t h e c o a s t o f Nicaragua, killing at least 13 people and leaving more passengers missing, official said.
Everybody sleeps, but what people stay up late to catch—or wake up early in order not to miss—varies by culture.
But perhaps I missed something  important in my mother's lessons about creativity and perfection.
Our ancestral selves miss the natural world and long for contact with non-human life.
I never miss a good film set in middle ages.
Oh, and love stories, I never miss one on TV
Jill missed her class last week.
My biology teacher did not even let me explain why I missed the field trip.
Barbara, on the other hand, has missed the excitement of her profession and does not feel she would be satisfied doing volunteer work
And I'm going to miss all my friends here, and especially this place.

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, you don't want to waste your precious hours on following the developments in a disorderly fashion, and miss important deadlines, confuse interview times or forget to follow up as a result.

Sentence.sentence: I for one try not to miss a single weekly meeting of my knitting group.

Sentence.sentence: We believe that to focus on longevity as primarily an issue of aging is to miss its full implications.
